title: Kpop
body:
Hello all,

With the recent release of K/DA, I thought I would advertise our club "Kpop" again for any people who may be new to Kpop.

We only have ~5 spots remaining.

The only requirement is to have a Kpop-related name and wear the club tag.

Post your name here or add BOL4 in-game to be added to the club.

:)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xRbPAVnqtcs
